title: On Ritual in the East and Criticism in the West: A Conversation with Chris Kavanagh
description:
Adding to my conversations surrounding the IDW, I speak with Chris who is one of their more critical listeners. We discuss why this is the case in the 2nd half of our chat, in the first half we speak on Chris's area of expertise; ritual in Japan.
We move on to speak about the IDW at around the 30 min mark

Listen on podcast here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/On-Ritual-in-the-East-and-Criticism-in-the-West-A-Conversation-with-Chris-Kavanagh-edcgqe

Follow Chris on twitter @C_Kavanagh 
Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis@hotmail.com
